site_name: The Reach, Thames Reach/Battery Road, Thamesmead, SE28
description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a non material amendment in connection with the planning permission 16/2163/F,  dated 09/05/2017 for a development comprising 66 residential dwellings (Use Class C3), a commercial/ community unit (Use Class A1-A3/D1) and associated access, servicing, parking, landscaping and works.   to allow:1. Setting out of building in relation to red line boundary - minor change during Stage 4, part of design development/buildability. ? 2. Ground floor flats G.4, G.5 & G.6, no longer 3b/5p now 3b/4p.3. Louvre doors to plant room. - design development. 4. Commercial doors now only 4 doors, rest are fixed windows.5. Building height reduced - each floor reduced by 1 brick during tender stage.6. Small windows next to ground floor flat entrances omitted.7. Small windows next to upper floor flat entrances omitted.8. Bay window configuration amended and metalwork omitted.9. Window openings sizes to gallery access reduced.10. Balcony metalwork amended with exposed concrete soffits.11. Louvres over some balcony doors omitted.12. Ground floor common parts windows amended.13. Car park layout.14. Individual Flues and boilers omitted. One central flue now provided.15. Change of brick type on gallery access from 2 to 1.16. Canopies over doors omitted.17. Rain water pipes reduced.
